SEARCH
Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Interface LogOutput

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Flushable, LogLifecycle
All Known Subinterfaces:
FileOutput, LogOutput.ThreadSafeLogOutput
All Known Implementing Classes:
ListLogOutput, LogOutput.AbstractOutputStreamOutput, RabbitMQOutput
public interface LogOutput extends LogLifecycle, Flushable
A resource that can be written to usually in binary. In other logging frameworks this is often called an "Appender" not be confused with RainbowGum's appenders.

To simplyfy flushing and corruption prevention each call to the write methods MUST be the contents of the entire event!

The write methods do not throw IOException on purpose as it is implementations responsibility to handle errors and to be resilient on their own.

See Also:
  • LogOutput.OutputProvider
  • LogEncoder.Buffer
